entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY ENDED, Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
